mutants.original_line: total = sum(ord(char.lower()) for char in letter) // position
mutants.mutated_line: total = sum((ord(char.lower()) for char in letter)) / position

mutants.original_line: total = sum(ord(char.lower()) for char in letter) // position
mutants.mutated_line: total = sum((ord(char.lower()) for char in letter)) * position
